summary: Diff restores an admin navigation data source and updates Header/AdminRouteGuard to expose/admin-gate /admin/* routes with desktop + mobile handling. However, the diff summary also indicates a wide set of unrelated UI/feature changes (HeroHelper voice/memory, homepage/theming, wallet BTC integration, etc.) that were not requested. Admin moderation approve/reject/upload functionality across all pending item types cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary (backend implementation is truncated; hooks are only described in a file summary).

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide admins full moderation capabilities for all option rooms requiring approval (upload/create where applicable; approve/reject for every pending item type shown in UI; backend enforces admin-only; UI shows success/failure and refreshes lists; no silent no-ops).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows capability-detection plumbing and mentions query hooks, but does not provide concrete evidence that every approval-focused admin page has working Approve/Reject (and upload/create where applicable) wired end-to-end with backend methods and UI refresh/outcome handling. backend/main.mo changes are truncated and do not show the required approve/reject methods or admin-only enforcement for each pending item type.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entry for frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts is descriptive only, code not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Eliminate regressions/errors introduced after v44 related to the admin menu and admin room actions; app must build/run cleanly; admin navigation/actions must not throw uncaught exceptions.
missing_requirements.reason: Build cleanliness and absence of runtime/console errors cannot be verified from the diff summary alone, and the diff includes many unrelated changes that could introduce regressions. No test/build evidence is provided in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced floating AI assistant (HeroHelper) with click-to-position, full voice capabilities, memory system, time-zone greetings, background monitoring mode, and 'comprehensive platform knowledge'.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside scope/non-goals (restore admin menu and admin moderation).

hallucinated_features.description: Wallet page integration with 'Counterparty mainnet node hosting' and real BTC transaction verification / real-time transaction history.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; introduces external/service-like behavior beyond admin menu/moderation scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Homepage/hero content changes (badges like "Streaming to 134 Countries Worldwide", version badges, swapping to verified people-free background images) and other non-admin UI refreshes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly a non-goal to recreate unrelated UI/feature changes outside Admin menu and moderation.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad theming/styling changes (global CSS enhancements, Tailwind theater theme colors/animations, layout route-aware backgrounds, updated footer/logo, updated index.html metadata).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested and likely outside the targeted fix for admin menu/moderation.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for frontend/src/index.css, frontend/tailwind.config.js, frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx, frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx, frontend/index.html)

hallucinated_features.description: Content library/player feature expansions (ContentGrid/ContentCard/ContentPlayer) beyond admin menu restoration.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to admin navigation/moderation requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Category browsing section with fixed genre tiles and IDs (Movies/Music/Live TV/Sports/Comedy/News).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to restoring Admin menu and admin moderation actions.
